tasks.label: detect-com-port
args: $json = & "${workspaceFolder}/../nrfutil.exe" device list --json --skip-overhead; $obj = $json | ConvertFrom-Json; if ($obj.devices -and $obj.devices.Count -gt 0 -and $obj.devices[0].serialPorts.Count -gt 0) { $obj.devices[0].serialPorts[0].comName | Out-File .vscode/comport.txt } else { "NO-DEVICE" | Out-File .vscode/comport.txt }

tasks.label: flash-dfu
args: $com = (Get-Content .vscode/comport.txt).Trim(); if ($com -eq "NO-DEVICE" -or $com -eq "") { Write-Error "No COM port detected!"; exit 1 }; & "${workspaceFolder}/../nrfutil.exe" nrf5sdk-tools dfu usb-serial -pkg "${workspaceFolder}/build/zephyr/app_dfu.zip" -p $com
